title: Nifty Expectedly Made Smart Gains Today, but why Tech Mahindra Stood Out Today
text:

Signs of de-escalation of US-China trade war and better than expected report on US private payrolls boosted the sentiments worldwide. Nifty gained 0.91% with index continuing to make significant gains. Nifty Auto spurted by 2.61% in today’s trade after it had jumped by more than 2% in yesterday’s trade.

Yesterday, , who assured that petrol and diesel vehicles will not be banned in the future and even said that the tax rates on these vehicles need to come down. Even today, India's junior finance minister Anurag Thakur mentioned that the automakers could expect full support from the government in the coming days.

Investors expect some sops to be announced for the ailing auto sector, which is why we see positive activity among auto stocks. Maruti Suzuki India Ltd. (NS: ) was up by 3.61% while Bajaj Auto (NS: ), Tata Motors (NS: ) and Mahindra & Mahindra (NS: ) all were up by more than 2.5% in today’s trade.

But the standout performer on index in today’s trade was Tech Mahindra (NS: ). Tech Mahindra’s stock jumped by 3.8% on the news that it will expand “its strategic collaboration with AT&T (NYSE: ) to accelerate AT&T’s IT network application, shared systems modernization and movement to the cloud.” AT&T is the biggest telecom player in the US, and this collaboration expansion is likely to be a 5-6 years contract with AT&T. This bodes well for Tech Mahindra’s fortunes.
